answers.answer: Oh wow that's a lot of appointments
Ya..I thought having 2 go once a week waa bad..for a non stress test...im sorry that sounds tough
I have to go to two appointments for non stress an OB check up and diabetes. It's ridiculous but they just want to make sure your baby is doing fine with the dresses l diabetes stuff.

Its only because they consider your pregnancy high risk.. they are just monitoring your babies heart rate closely.. are they giving you a c section.. because if so that might also be the reason.. its really annoying but worth it because they are monitoring you hope everything goes well for you and your family!

I am 34 weeks... and they will induce me in about 4 weeks... and my thing is I understand why all the visit but when do I suppose to work and make sure my 3rd are old is not sitting in a Dr's offices half the day...

question: Today I was told I have 2 come to the Dr's twice a week for stress test, once a week for ultrasound, once a week for a regular check up and than once a week for my diabetic dr... When do I suppose to be at work and I have a 3 year old... I ask to be put on bed rest but the Dr said it's no medical reason to be on bed rest but I am like than why is it a medical reason for all these Dr's appt...
title: My Dr's Are Crazy! !!!
